surepy.data.clustering module¶

Methods for clustering localization data in LocData objects..

surepy.data.clustering.clustering(locdata, **kwargs)[source]¶

Cluster localizations in LocData using a specified clustering algorithm.

Parameters:
  • locdata (LocData) – specifying the localization data on which to perform the manipulation.
  • kwargs (dict) – Parameters for specified clustering algorithm.
Returns:

a new instance of Collection assembling all generated selections (i.e. localization cluster).
Return type:

Collection
surepy.data.clustering.clustering_hdbscan(locdata, min_cluster_size=5, allow_single_cluster=False)[source]¶

Cluster localizations in locdata using the hdbscan clustering algorithm.

Parameters:
  • locdata (LocData) – specifying the localization data on which to perform the manipulation.
  • min_cluster_size (int) – minimumm cluster size in HDBSCAN algorithm (default: 5)
  • allow_single_cluster (bool) – allowing to return single cluster (default: False)
Returns:

a new LocData instance assembling all generated selections (i.e. localization cluster).
Return type:

LocData
